author: Simon Difford
description: A tequila and brandy-based Manhattan. When I first made this cocktail I concluded I thought it needed bitters. It doesn't, but if you do add bitters then vanilla, Boker's or Abbott's all work better than Angostura or simular aromatic bitters.
name: Mexican Lover

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
